statements: UPDATE debt_management_teams SET debt_amount = 5000.00, risk_level = 'low' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE debt_management_teams SET collection_strategy = 'Automated Email' WHERE account_number = '12345678';
UPDATE debt_management_teams SET debt_amount = debt_amount + 500.00, risk_level = 'high' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE debt_management_teams SET collection_strategy = 'Automated calling system' WHERE risk_level = 'medium' AND debt_amount > 1000.00;
UPDATE DebtAccounts SET debt_amount = 1500.00 WHERE account_id = 1234;
UPDATE CollectionEfforts SET collection_amount = 2000.00, collection_status = 'Paid' WHERE collection_id = 5678;
UPDATE DebtAccounts SET debt_amount = 1500.50, risk_level = 'High' WHERE account_id = 100;
UPDATE CollectionEfforts SET collection_amount = 2000.75, collection_date = '2022-08-20' WHERE collection_id = 500;
UPDATE debt_accounts SET debt_amount = 5000 WHERE account_id = 101
UPDATE debt_collections SET collection_date = '2022-06-30', collector_id = 201 WHERE account_id = 102
UPDATE debt_accounts SET debt_amount = 5000.00, account_status = 'ACTIVE' WHERE account_id = 123
UPDATE debt_collections SET collector_id = 456, collection_date = '2023-01-15' WHERE collection_id = 789
UPDATE debt_accounts SET debt_amount = debt_amount + 1000 WHERE account_id = 1;
UPDATE debt_payments SET payment_amount = 5000, payment_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE account_id = 3;
UPDATE debt_accounts SET debt_amount = debt_amount + 2000 WHERE account_id = 101
UPDATE debt_payments SET payment_amount = 1500, payment_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE payment_id = 201
UPDATE debt_analysis SET debt_status = 'Paid' WHERE debt_id = 1;
UPDATE high_risk_accounts SET risk_score = 80 WHERE account_id = 3;
UPDATE debt_analysis SET debt_status = 'Closed' WHERE debt_id = 100;
UPDATE high_risk_accounts SET risk_score = 85, account_type = 'High Risk' WHERE account_name = 'John Doe';
